block.p: Patricia Lynn Goldman, a daughter of Gay and Carl Goldman of New York, was married last evening to Timothy Sebastian Perini, the son of Eileen and David Perini of Dover, Mass. Cantor Raymond Smolover performed the ceremony at Lyndhurst, the Jay Gould house in Tarrytown, N.Y. The Rev. Michael Guarino, a Roman Catholic priest, took part in the ceremony.
The couple graduated from Harvard University.

Patricia Lynn Goldman, a daughter of Gay and Carl Goldman of New York, was married last evening to Timothy Sebastian Perini, the son of Eileen and David Perini of Dover, Mass. Cantor Raymond Smolover performed the ceremony at Lyndhurst, the Jay Gould house in Tarrytown, N.Y. The Rev. Michael Guarino, a Roman Catholic priest, took part in the ceremony.
The couple graduated from Harvard University.

The bride, 27, is a producer for the Internet service of the Fox News Channel in New York. She received a master's degree in theater from the University of Southern California. Her father is the president of Corporate Capital Consultants, an investment bank in New York. Her mother is the chairwoman of the Manhattan Theater Club Patrons Council and a member of theater's board.

Mr. Perini, , 30, is a civil engineer, in New York for the Perini Corporation, a construction company in Framingham, Mass., headed by his father. The bridegroom received a master's degree in civil engineering from the University of California at Berkeley. His mother is a psychotherapist for Boston College's counseling services in Chestnut Hill, Mass.
